segments.text: Oh man, look at that sink overflowing like crazy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water's just gushing out, soaking everything in sight.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And that woman? She's oblivious, polishing her plate like nothing's wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot's in the puddle already; she's gonna slip any minute.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe she's not turning off the faucet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now those kids over there, sneaking cookies behind her back.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's on that rickety stool, stretching way too far.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: If he falls, it'll be a disaster with all that water on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's just egging him on, reaching up for her cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole kitchen is a ticking time bomb of accidents.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The open cabinets make it even worse; everything could come crashing down.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish someone would yell and stop this nonsense right now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside the window, it's all serene, which just makes me madder.
segments.speaker: PAR
